text: Erdoğan Atalay (born 22 September 1966) is a German actor. He is best known for his role as Detective Chief Superintendent Semir Gerkhan in the longest- running television series Alarm für Cobra 11 - Die Autobahnpolizei. He was born in Hanover, West Germany. His father is Turkish and his mother is German. == Other websites == * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:German television actors Category:Actors from Lower Saxony Category:People from Hanover
title: Erdoğan Atalay
